meanings.sent1: She was misusing the computer by pressing all the keys at once.

meanings.sent3: The cat was misusing the scratching post as a bed, much to the dog's amusement.
meanings.sent4: Her misusing of the recipe turned the cake into a salty disaster.
meanings.sent5: The misusing of the map led them deep into the forest with no way out.

meanings.definition: Treat (someone or something) badly or unfairly.
meanings.sent1: The bully was misusing his power to intimidate the other students.
meanings.sent2: She felt guilty for misusing her friend's trust by spreading rumors.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous kitten was misusing the toy mouse by hiding it in unexpected places.
meanings.sent4: The storm was misusing the fragile umbrella, turning it inside out in seconds.
meanings.sent5: The misusing of the fragile vase resulted in it shattering into a thousand pieces.
